parameters.name: logdir
parameters.documentation: Log directory in which the summary data will be written.

parameters.name: filenameSuffix
parameters.documentation:
Suffix of the protocol buffer file names to be
written in the `logdir` (default: `.v2`).

parameters.name: logdir
parameters.documentation: Directory to which the logs will be written.

parameters.name: updateFreq
parameters.documentation:
The frequency at which loss and metric values are written to logs.

Currently supported options are:

- 'batch': Write logs at the end of every batch of training, in addition
   to the end of every epoch of training.
- 'epoch': Write logs at the end of every epoch of training.

Note that writing logs too often slows down the training.

Default: 'epoch'.
